issue.title: [C++] Avoid util::optional in favor of separate inlineable functions in arrow/visitor_inline.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9214](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9214). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently null is being checked for twice (once when deciding what kind of optional to send to the passed function, and then again inside that function) when it only need be checked once
